page.title: 03ROAD-SURVEY
page.content:
There are five roads which criss-cross the survey block. The A16 trunk road is busy, especially in the summer, and is well maintained. The others are lanes which are little used and in much poorer condition. These lanes vary in width, including verges, from two to fifteen metres. The wider of these lanes and one bridle way in the area were much used wagon routes at one time. Traffic surveys carried out on 21st. June 1985 showed the following results:
A16 3.35 to 4.05 pm. 80 cars; 18 vans; 34 lorries; 1 coach; 4 m/cycles; 2 tractors.
Minor Road Ruckland 8.35 to 9.35am. 11cars; 3vans.
